title: Train fault causing delays on East bound line

updates.text: [UPDATE] Train service has resumed. Free bus service still available between Lakeside and Clementi in both directions.
[UPDATE] Due to a train fault at Jurong East, there will be no train service from Lakeside to Clementi on the East bound towards Pasir Ris.
Due to a train fault at Jurong East, there will be 20 min delay from Joo Koon to Jurong East  on the East bound line towards Pasir Ris.
